```{r}
library(ggplot2)

diamonds <- ggplot2::diamonds

p <- ggplot(data = diamonds, aes(x = carat, y = price)) + 
  geom_col()
```
```{r}
p
```
```{r}
cols_regexp <- paste0("\\b(", paste0(names(diamonds), "", collapse = "|"), ")\\b")
unlist(regmatches(q, gregexpr(cols_regexp, q)))
strsplit(q, " ")[grep(cols_regexp, strsplit(q, ""))]


gghelp(query = "facet by carat and cut", data = diamonds)

ggplot(data = diamonds, aes(x = cut, y = price)) +
  geom_col() +
  gg_(query = "grid by carat vertical", data = diamonds)
```
```{r}
data_cols <- names(diamonds)
unlist(data_cols[match(c("carat", "cut"), data_cols)])
```
